channel.title: Npc talking issue
channel.description: My problem is i can seem to make my npcs talk (above their heads) there arent any npcs in my game that do that yet. So i think i may be missing a variable or something like that =/ i was just woundering if someone could maby help me out by explaining or posting how to make variables and help me to make my npcs speak ;) I hope someone can help :D PS. i'm kind of new to programming java its probally something stupid that i couldnt figure out :)
